StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetNumberofContracts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @EndDate date.me = NULL, @Contracts integer OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @MonthsInDateRange int
SELECT @EndDate = COALESCE(@EndDate, @BeginDate)
SELECT @MonthsInDateRange = DATEDIFF(MONTH, @BeginDate, @EndDate)
SELECT * INTO #ORGS FROM dbo.GetOrgHierarchy (@Organiza.onID)
SELECT @Contracts = COUNT(C.CONTRACT_ID) FROM #ORGS O INNER JOIN NWA N ON (O.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AND O.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' AND COALESCE(N.COMP_CHANGE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y') INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, @BeginDate) BETWEEN 1 - @MonthsInDateRange AND 3)
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #ORGS SET NOCOUNT OFF
